alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 9:18PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Beaver, eastern Texas, northern Lipscomb and northern Ochiltree Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Elmwood, or 7 miles south of Beaver, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin, Slapout and Balko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
